description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=2/3, Sex=2/3, Mature Content=3/3. Blast your way through 32 levels of destruction madness. Put your piloting skills to the test with planes, helicopters... and missile launcher mounted jetpacks that cut through rocks like butter.  Collect Rewards but avoid Flopwards!  From the makers of Platformance: Castle Pain comes a game about: bombs and bombers, skills and rankings, babes and bunkers. BUNKER BUSTER!
